title: @Riot - Why are you nerfing AP Tristana?
body:
I'm very curious as to why her ratios are being hit so hard on the beta right now. (Rocket Jump from .7 to .5 and Explosive Shot from .9 to .7)

AP Tristana is such a fun and actually interesting style of play since she has that all-in assassin play style, but if you mess up then you are straight up dead..as an assassin should be. I'd really like to know why it's being nerfed, unless there's something more to the update that I'm not seeing.
